data.trans: Trở nên bình tĩnh, bớt kích động, bớt hưng phấn
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy rất tức giận. Hãy cho cô ấy thời gian để bình tĩnh.
data.en_hint: She's very angry. Give her some time to cool down.
data.content_game_1: She's very angry. Give her some time to cool down.
data.answer_en_hint: She's very angry. Give her some time to cool down.

data.trans_hint: Tôi cần ngồi xuống nghỉ ngơi sau 3 tiếng làm vườn.
data.en_hint: I need to have a sit-down after 3 hours of gardening.
data.content_game_1: I need to have a sit-down after 3 hours of gardening.
data.answer_en_hint: I need to have a sit-down after 3 hours of gardening.

data.trans: Quá khích (hoặc quá cảm xúc về việc gì)
data.trans_hint: Cậu không cần thiết phải quá khích về bình luận của mọi người trên bài đăng đó.
data.en_hint: You shouldn't get too worked up about people's comments on that post.
data.content_game_1: You shouldn't get too worked up about people's comments on that post.
data.answer_en_hint: You shouldn't get too worked up about people's comments on that post.

data.content: bring a smile to your face
data.trans_hint: Làm những điều tốt tuy nhỏ nhặt cho những người xung quanh chắc chắn sẽ khiến bạn mỉm cười mỗi ngày.
data.en_hint: Doing little good things for people around certainly brings a smile to your face on a regular basis.
data.content_game_1: Doing little good things for people around certainly brings a smile to your face on a regular basis.
data.answer_en_hint: Doing little good things for people around certainly brings a smile to your face on a regular basis.

data.trans_hint: Câu chuyện đau lòng của cô ấy chắc chắn sẽ khiến bạn rơi lệ.
data.en_hint: Her heart-wrenching story will definitely bring tears to your eyes.
data.content_game_1: Her heart-wrenching story will definitely bring tears to your eyes.
data.answer_en_hint: Her heart-wrenching story will definitely bring tears to your eyes.

data.trans: Nén cái gì lại (cảm xúc, tâm trạng)
data.trans_hint: Sâu trong lòng, tôi cảm thấy rất buồn khi cô ấy ra đi, nhưng tôi đã cố nén nó lại.
data.en_hint: Deep down, I felt very sad about her leaving, but I tried to choke it back.
data.content_game_1: Deep down, I felt very sad about her leaving, but I tried to choke it back.
data.answer_en_hint: Deep down, I felt very sad about her leaving, but I tried to choke it back.

data.trans_hint: Cô ta cảm thấy chán chường sau 1 tuần thu mình trong phòng.
data.en_hint: She felt down in the dumps after 1 week of locking herself in the room.
data.content_game_1: She felt down in the dumps after 1 week of locking herself in the room.
data.answer_en_hint: She felt down in the dumps after 1 week of locking herself in the room.

data.trans_hint: Trò chơi khăm của câu ta khiến tôi giật hết cả mình.
data.en_hint: His prank really made me jump out of my skin.
data.content_game_1: His prank really made me jump out of my skin.
data.answer_en_hint: His prank really made me jump out of my skin.
